Uses of Package
alix.lucene.search

  • Packages that use alix.lucene.search 
    Package Description
    alix.lucene
    Main pilots for indexing and searching, see especially Alix
    alix.lucene.search
    Objects to search and calculate lexical statistics from an index (ex: found occurrences by facet)
    alix.web
    JspTools tools
  • Classes in alix.lucene.search used by alix.lucene 
    Class Description
    FieldFacet
    A dedicated dictionary for facets, to allow similarity scores.
    FieldInt
    Retrieve all values of an int field, store it in docId order, calculate some stats..
    FieldRail
    Persistent storage of full sequence of all document search for a field.
    FieldText
    An object recording different stats for a lucene text field.
    Scale
    Handle data to display results as a chronology, according to subset of an index, given as a bitset.
  • Classes in alix.lucene.search used by alix.lucene.search 
    Class Description
    FieldFacet
    A dedicated dictionary for facets, to allow similarity scores.
    FieldText
    An object recording different stats for a lucene text field.
    FieldText.DocStats  
    FormEnum
    This object is build to collect list of search with useful stats for semantic interpretations and score calculations.
    Scale.Tick
    A row of data for a crossing axis
    Specif
    Interface for a scorer to calculate specific search from a corpus or a part.
    TermList
    An object to store lucene search with a frequency indice.
  • Classes in alix.lucene.search used by alix.web 
    Class Description
    Specif
    Interface for a scorer to calculate specific search from a corpus or a part.
